analysis.key_quote: Allowing political appointees to have a say in the grant issuing process is a fantastic way to get rid of objectivity and further reduce the standing of the US in the view of the rest of the world.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the involvement of political appointees in the grant issuing process, highlighting concerns about the loss of objectivity and the potential negative impact on scientific integrity, which aligns with themes opposing politicization.
